original_text: Then the Lord opened the eyes of Balaam, and he saw the angel of the Lord standing in the way, with his drawn sword in his hand. And he bowed down and fell on his face.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 발람의 눈을 밝히시매 여호와의 사자가 손에 칼을 빼들고 길에 선 것을 그가 보고 머리를 숙이고 엎드리니

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord opened the eyes of Balaam
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주께서 발람의 눈을 열어 주셨다

sentences.original_text: and he saw the angel of the Lord

sentences.korean_translation: 그 천사는 길 한가운데 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: with his drawn sword in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에는 뽑은 칼이 들려 있었다
